topics.body:
"@Princessâ™ Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d5c7676368727646890c00#post_54d5c7676368727646890c00
Sort of. It's hever gets to Madoka levels but it gets pretty dark.
If I had to describe what Tutu was about, it would be that's it's a story about the power and nature of stories. How, even a simple story can drive the meekest of individuals to do the bravest of things. How a story can make us, happy, sad, or angry and seemingly come to life before our very eyes.
